task_description: Task to arrange home modifications for elderly

must_have: I'm not really sure what's important
nice_to_have: Create a garden area with raised beds for easy access and enjoyment
Implement color-coded pathways to assist with navigation
Install non-slip flooring throughout the home to prevent falls
Install automatic door openers for convenience
deal_breakers: Complex kitchen layouts that hinder meal preparation

decision_factors: Type of modifications needed (e.g., ramps, grab bars)

technical: Something modern that I think will work well
I heard something about smart technologies but I'm not sure what
Maybe some kind of adjustable furniture?
non_technical: A good reputation for performance and safety
Flexibility in designs since I don’t know what’s best
I want it to feel comfortable, whatever that means

must_meet: It should not exceed my budget but also be high quality
I think it needs to be safe, but I’m not sure what that involves
should_meet: I’d like it to be easy to navigate but also stylish
It would be great if it could be done in a reasonable time frame, whatever that means
nice_to_meet: If it could have features that help with mobility, that would be nice
I would appreciate if it felt modern and welcoming
